mdRecord.dcterms:title: Cavalry Office, exterior|general view
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: U. S. Cavalry headquarters was Camp A. E. Wood, now the Wawona Campground. This particular peaked-roof building was erected in Wawona as headquarters for the commanding officer who served as “Acting Superintendent” of Yosemite National Park. -- https://www.yosemite.ca.us/pioneer-yosemite-history-center/cavalry_office.html [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
